Read full topic

item.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:3, topic:394629”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=491815.msg3596703#msg3596703 date=1305162149]

hey guys i need someone to help me add client sided clipping because server sided clipping makes me add every friggin object in the game!!

No it doesn’t.

All you would need to do is either find the “map” data that contains the collision details, copy it server-side, then edit the walking algorithm to check if there are any “collideable” objects in the current path, and if so generate a new path from the last non-collision tile

OR

Have a list of ObjectDefinition classes that represent the config of each object (Type(wall, door, tile, etc), collision flag, etc), and then edit the walking algorithm as mentioned above.
[/quote]

The kid can’t spell jerk right, what makes who think he’ll understand that?[/quote]
first of all im arabian so that’s why i spelled it wrong and i think i didn’t spell spelled right too.
and second of all you missspelled “you” lol.
third of all I’m not a kid I’m 16 dumbass.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:394629”][quote author=own master link=topic=491815.msg3596488#msg3596488 date=1305144782]
hey guys i need someone to help me add client sided clipping because server sided clipping makes me add every friggin object in the game!!
[/quote]

No it doesn’t.

All you would need to do is either find the “map” data that contains the collision details, copy it server-side, then edit the walking algorithm to check if there are any “collideable” objects in the current path, and if so generate a new path from the last non-collision tile

OR

Have a list of ObjectDefinition classes that represent the config of each object (Type(wall, door, tile, etc), collision flag, etc), and then edit the walking algorithm as mentioned above.[/quote]

The kid can’t spell jerk right, what makes who think he’ll understand that?

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

own master:

hey guys i need someone to help me add client sided clipping because server sided clipping makes me add every friggin object in the game!!

No it doesn’t.

All you would need to do is either find the “map” data that contains the collision details, copy it server-side, then edit the walking algorithm to check if there are any “collideable” objects in the current path, and if so generate a new path from the last non-collision tile

OR

Have a list of ObjectDefinition classes that represent the config of each object (Type(wall, door, tile, etc), collision flag, etc), and then edit the walking algorithm as mentioned above.
